channel.title: CVE Feed for COWELL INFORMATION SYSTEM CO., LTD. -- enterprise travel management system
channel.description: The latest CVEs for COWELL INFORMATION SYSTEM CO., LTD. -- enterprise travel management system

item.title: CVE-2022-39054|2024-08-03T11:10:32.339Z -- cowell%20information%20system%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- enterprise%20travel%20management%20system
item.description: Cowell enterprise travel management system has insufficient filtering for special characters within web URL. An unauthenticated remote attacker can inject JavaScript and perform XSS (Reflected Cross-Site Scripting) attack.
